name: Astral Green
description:
The Story

An alien race known as the "Buv’Kli" have sneaked their way into the New Gunk City sewer system where they are breeding and quickly infecting the populace with a virus known as “Astral Green''. It is an extremely volatile mutagen that reacts violently with the body.  It turns humans into disgusting, slimy, insect creatures, and ultimately leads to death.

Having recently been infected, you head into the New Gunk City sewer system as a martyr in hopes to destroy the Buv'Kli breeding grounds and the source of the virus.

Use three different Astral Green mutations as weapons and keep the virus from fully taking over your body.

The Controls

WASD to move

Shift to sprint

Mouse to look, left-click to shoot

Space to jump

Num keys 1, 2, and 3 to swap weapons

E to open doors

The Team

This is our first jam and was a great learning experience. All assets were created by us.

Programming - Austin Krutz

Art - Aron Adkins : twitter : instagram

Music - AJ Johnson : bandcamp

SFX - Zazenbo
